name: Cream Corn
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen corn kernels, thawed
directions: Combine the corn, cream, salt, sugar, pepper and butter in a skillet. Whisk together the milk and flour, then stir into the corn mixture. Stir over medium heat until the mixture is thickened and corn is cooked through. Remove from heat, and stir in Parmesan cheese until melted.

name: Cereal
directions: Combine milk and cereal in a bowl and serve.

name: Turkey
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen corn kernels, thawed
directions: Season and bake in oven at 350 degrees.
